article_title: A Private Solution To The VA Health System's Problems

article_metadata.description: By CASEY QUINN and PAUL KECKLEY, PhD: By accepting the resignation of the Secretary, passing legislation to spend billions to enhance access to primary care, and opening federal investigations into the matter, officials have signaled their intent to get it right. A bolder step warrants a national conversation: integrating the VA with the private sector.
article_metadata.author: The Apothecary
